H8662.definition: Tartak, a deity of the Avvites

H8664.definition: a Tishbite or inhabitant of Tishbeh (in Gilead)
H8664.derivation: patrial from an unused name meaning recourse;

H8666.definition: a recurrence (of time or place); a reply (as returned)

H8668.definition: rescue (literal or figurative, persons, national or spiritual)
H8668.derivation: or תְּשֻׁעָה; from H7768 (שָׁוַע) in the sense of H3467 (יָשַׁע);

H8669.derivation: from H7783 (שׁוּק) in the original sense of stretching out after;

H8670.derivation: from H7788 (שׁוּר) in the sense of arrival;

H8672.derivation: or (masculine) תִּשְׁעָה; perhaps from H8159 (שָׁעָה) through the idea of a turn to the next or full number ten;
